thoughts.text: I think I need to set the value of the TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN environment variable before executing the modified Python script.
thoughts.reasoning: The error message returned when I executed the modified Python script indicates that the value of the TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN environment variable has not been set. I need to set the value of the TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN environment variable to the bearer token value before executing the modified Python script.
thoughts.plan:
- Set the value of the TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN environment variable to the bearer token value
- Execute the modified Python script to authenticate the Twitter API
- Use the Twitter API to search for tweets with information on both language learning resources and travel guides
- Explore the tweets and make note of any useful resources
- Begin learning a new language and planning a trip to a new location
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to spend too much time browsing tweets and instead focus on taking action towards my goals.
thoughts.speak: I think I need to set the value of the TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN environment variable to the bearer token value before executing the modified Python script. Would you like me to set the value of the environment variable?
